todos.content: Replace barrel Lucide imports with per-icon imports for tree-shaking
Move static arrays outside component to prevent re-creation
Add AbortController to debounce and cancel in-flight requests
Replace any type with proper union types for type safety
Add aria-labels to icon-only buttons for accessibility
Add input length sanitization on client side
Improve copy button UX with instant feedback
Add swap languages button rotation animation
